items.title: linkStyle styles split across multiple lines
items.summary: Maid accepts multiline style declarations (indices on one line; styles on following lines). Current mermaid-cli rejects when styles start on a new line.
items.maid: Parses indices, then style pairs across subsequent lines; validates indices (duplicates/out-of-range).
items.mermaid: Parse error after indices when a newline precedes styles; expects styles on the same line as indices.
items.proposedAction: Align with mermaid-cli (reject multiline) or gate via an option; keep ranges like 0:3 invalid.
